forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning, mainly cloudy during the afternoon with a few showers. High 13C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning with a few showers possible during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 51F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 12C. NE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 53F. NE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
